sourceMeaningMnemonic: You try to put your <radical>toe</radical> inside a <radical>shellfish</radical>, but it just won't open. That's because this shellfish has sworn an oath of <kanji>chastity</kanji>.
meaningInfo: "No, I won't open up until I meet the toe I will marry," it says to you.
readingMnemonic: "<kanji>Chastity</kanji> is really important to me," the shellfish says. "But, maybe if you give me a <reading>ta</reading>ter (<ja>てい</ja>) tot, I'll change my mind."
readingInfo: You give the shellfish a tater tot, and it breaks its vow of chastity, opening up for your toe. You look the other way, but you can hear the sounds of passion below.
